briefTitle: Treatment of Patients With Nocturia (Non-PK Study)

eligibilityModule.eligibilityCriteria:
Inclusion Criteria:

* Male and Female 50 years or older
* Nocturia of 6 or more months duration averaging 2 episodes or more per night

Exclusion Criteria:

* CHF
* Diabetes
* Diabetes Insipidus, Renal Insufficiency, Hepatic Insufficiency
* Incontinence
* Illness requiring steroids
* Current or past urologic malignancy
* Nephrotic Syndrome
* Unexplained pelvic masses
* Urinary bladder neurological dysfunction
* Urinary bladder surgery or radiotherapy
* Sleep Apnea
* Pregnant or breast feeding

outcomeMeasures.title: Change in Mean Number of Nocturic Episodes/Night
outcomeMeasures.description: Change was calculated as the mean number of nocturic episodes per night between baseline and Week 7

outcomeMeasures.title: Percent of Participants With at Least 50% Decrease in Mean Nocturic Episodes Per Night
outcomeMeasures.description: Percent of participants achieving at least 50% reduction in nocturic episodes during the last week of treatment compared to baseline
